Uses of Class
org.jscsi.exception.NoSuchSessionException

  • Packages that use NoSuchSessionException 
    Package Description
    org.jscsi.initiator
    This package contains all the core classes to provide an easy and usable iSCSI (RFC 3720) initiator.
    org.jscsi.initiator.connection
    This package contains all the states of a connection and all phases of the iSCSI (RFC 3720) implementation.
    org.jscsi.initiator.example  

    • Uses of NoSuchSessionException in org.jscsi.initiator

      Methods in org.jscsi.initiator that throw NoSuchSessionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Initiator.closeSession(String targetName)
      Closes all opened connections within this session to the given target.
      void Initiator.createSession(String targetName)
      Creates a new session with the given target name, which is read from the configuration file.
      long Initiator.getBlockSize(String targetName)
      Returns the used block size (in bytes) of the iSCSI Target.
      long Initiator.getCapacity(String targetName)
      Returns the capacity (in blocks) of the iSCSI Target.
      InetSocketAddress Configuration.getTargetAddress(String targetName)
      Returns the InetAddress instance of the connected iSCSI Target.
      Future<Void> Initiator.multiThreadedRead(String targetName, ByteBuffer dst, int logicalBlockAddress, long transferLength)
      Invokes a read operation for the session targetName and store the read bytes in the buffer dst.
      Future<Void> Initiator.multiThreadedWrite(String targetName, ByteBuffer src, int logicalBlockAddress, long transferLength)
      Invokes a write operation for the session targetName and transmits the bytes in the buffer dst.
      void Initiator.read(String targetName, ByteBuffer dst, int logicalBlockAddress, long transferLength)
      Invokes a read operation for the session targetName and store the read bytes in the buffer dst.
      void Initiator.removeSession(Session sessionReq)
      Removes the Session instances form the sessions queue.
      void Configuration.update(String targetName, int connectionID, SettingsMap response)
      Updates the stored settings of a connection with these values from the response of the iSCSI Target.
      void Initiator.write(String targetName, ByteBuffer src, int logicalBlockAddress, long transferLength)
      Invokes a write operation for the session targetName and transmits the bytes in the buffer dst.

    • Uses of NoSuchSessionException in org.jscsi.initiator.connection

      Methods in org.jscsi.initiator.connection that throw NoSuchSessionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Connection.update(SettingsMap response)
      Updates all entries of the given response key-values with the stored settings of this instance.
